Package com.cafean.client.ui.util

Class AnchoredControlPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.util.ControlPoint
      • com.cafean.client.ui.util.AnchoredControlPoint
  • public class AnchoredControlPoint
extends ControlPoint
    A control point implementation intended for use by points that are "anchored" to another location. This is represented in paint(java.awt.Graphics, int) by drawing a dashed line from the "anchor" location to this point's location.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AnchoredControlPoint​(int x, int y, int ax, int ay)
      Creates a new anchored control point
      AnchoredControlPoint​(java.awt.Point p, java.awt.Point ap)
      Creates a new anchored control point.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      int getAy()
      returns the anchor point y coordinate
      void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g, int handleSize)
      draws this control point in the given Graphics at the given size.

                            int ay)
        Creates a new anchored control point
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this point
        y - the y coordinate of this point
        ax - the x coordinate of the anchor location for this point
        ay - the y coordinate of the anchor location for this point

                            java.awt.Point ap)
        Creates a new anchored control point.
        Parameters:
        p - the control point
        ap - the point that this control point is anchored to
